house_listing.house_description: This 1 level detached single family home built in 1923 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 3 car garage and approximately 1300 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: One Source Realty/Better Homes One Source Realty/Better Homes

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
